U-turn.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a turn that you make in a car, on a bicycle etc, so that you go back in the direction you came from
U-turn.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He made a quick U-turn and sped away.
U-turn.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a complete change of ideas, plans etc
